title: Lovely phone
body: What’s not to like, it’s brilliant thank you

title: IPhone 12
body: Good purchase for my wife having the three features I wanted for her - wireless charging, dual SIM and also eSIM capable.

title: Very good iPhone
body: This is very good mobile, meets all my needs and good price. I got 256gb which is a good size. It came well packaged so please about that.

title: Good phone except…
body: Everything good except very poor battery life in reality uses.

title: Total satisfaction
body: I loved everything about this model.The camera is pin sharp ,the screen is epic.The speakers have great quality sound.I cannot find anything wrong with the device definitely the best iPhone I had had up till now.Highly recommend the 12 pro max.

title: Good little phone
body: Comparable to the Samsung S20. No better and no worse. Pros; security. Cons; lens flare that I never got with the S20. But all in all they are pretty much like for like and it’s down to personal preference.

title: First new phone
body: Nice phone, meets all my requirements

title: Brilliant
body: Liked everything about this really great

title: Battery life & photo good
body: Bought for my son he is really pleased with it

title: Amazon Boxing - Awful
body: no issue with the phoneit was the state of the packaging from amazon - surprised the phone arrived in one piece

title: Best purchase ever
body: Refurbished IPhone 12. Immaculate and half the price of a new iPhone 14
